title: Survey
additional-notes: Auction sites describe this as 'a rare giveaway comic' published by Marvel.  The subtitle on the only known issue is 'A Comic Magazine Devoted to the Juvenile Market'.

A note in the 1976 Jan-Jun CCE Periodicals volume says to 'consult copyright office' for full issue renewal information.  The first cataloged issue renewal, mentioned in the July-December 1977 CCE Periodicals volume, is for the 1948 issue, and was filed in 1976.
